segment.source: You can generate HTML-based and XML-based reports for reviewing settings within any version of a Group Policy Object (GPO).
segment.target: You can generate HTML-based and XML-based reports for reviewing settings within any version of a Group Policy Object (GPO).

segment.source: A user account with the Reviewer, Editor, Approver, or AGPM Administrator (Full Control) role or necessary permissions in Advanced Group Policy Management (AGPM) is required to complete this procedure.
segment.target: A user account with the Reviewer, Editor, Approver, or AGPM Administrator (Full Control) role or necessary permissions in Advanced Group Policy Management (AGPM) is required to complete this procedure.

segment.source: Review the details in "Additional considerations" in this topic.
segment.target: Review the details in "Additional considerations" in this topic.

segment.source: To review settings in any version of a GPO
segment.target: To review settings in any version of a GPO

segment.source: In the Group Policy Management Console tree, click Change Control in the forest and domain in which you want to manage GPOs.
segment.target: In the Group Policy Management Console tree, click Change Control in the forest and domain in which you want to manage GPOs.

segment.source: On the Contents tab in the details pane, click a tab to display GPOs.
segment.target: On the Contents tab in the details pane, click a tab to display GPOs.

segment.source: Double-click the GPO to display its history.
segment.target: Double-click the GPO to display its history.

segment.source: Right-click the GPO version for which to review the settings, click Settings, and then click HTML Report or XML Report to display a summary of the GPO's settings.
segment.target: Right-click the GPO version for which to review the settings, click Settings, and then click HTML Report or XML Report to display a summary of the GPO's settings.

segment.source: By default, you must be a Reviewer, an Editor, an Approver, or an AGPM Administrator (Full Control) to perform this procedure.
segment.target: By default, you must be a Reviewer, an Editor, an Approver, or an AGPM Administrator (Full Control) to perform this procedure.

segment.source: Specifically, you must have List Contents and Read Settings permissions for the GPO.
segment.target: Specifically, you must have List Contents and Read Settings permissions for the GPO.

segment.source: Also, to display the list of GPOs, you must have List Contents permission for the domain.
segment.target: Also, to display the list of GPOs, you must have List Contents permission for the domain.
